Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{3: 'Climbing up the long and narrow steps, you come upon a relatively safe area, finally allowing you to unload the heavy mods and empty air cylinder.'}
{3: 'You search all the accessible floors but find no one. Only the rooms lying in ruins remain unsearched.'}
{2: 'We need to think of a way in.', 3: '6'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But there aren't any signs of activities in these rooms.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No signs of activities?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Correct. Maybe the person that cried for help is already...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I can't reach Bridget. And we can't get away from the Red Tide...", 4: '2'}
{2: "Well, let's still check them out then.", 3: '13'}
{3: 'The wreckage in front of you looks like they were once a pile of furniture intentionally placed there to block the entrance, before being blown to pieces.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's clean up the debris first.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The four of you use improvised shovels to clear out the debris in the corridor.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{3: 'Opening the doors, you find what appears to be similar storage rooms one after another.'}
{3: 'In the last room, old daily necessities are littered throughout, accompanied by stacks of storage boxes. Several work uniforms discarded in the corner have grown moldy over time.'}
{3: 'An old polymer screen that seems to separate a changing area for the employees stands resolutely in place on the other side of the room.'}
{3: 'Lee steps over the scattered objects and pulls the screen away.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Seeing his odd expression, the rest of you rush over to him.', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'Behind the screen, you see a Construct and a human in commandant uniform.', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What's a Construct squad from Babylonia doing here?", 4: '2'}
{2: "They weren't the ones calling for help... were they?", 3: '32'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Looks like... the commandant must have been dead for over a week.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I heard from another squad leader that a squad came here on a mission but never returned.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is this them? Do you think there are any others...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Can we recover the virtual projection?', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Yes, but we're already out of range from the security terminal. We should set up another one here to boost the signal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright, it should be safe here.', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We'll leave it to you, Lee.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lee nods, then he pulls out a security terminal from his bag.'}
{2: 'Oh, right. Any response from Asimov?', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Not yet. There's a lot of signal fluctuation here. We'll have to wait.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'You nod to Liv and quietly watch Lee operate the delicate security terminal.'}
{2: 'Spear of F.O.S.', 3: 'Security terminal operational. Select an area to retrieve data.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Just retrieve data from the last day they were alive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spear of F.O.S.', 3: 'Acquiring target data [>>>>>>>>] Complete.'}
{2: 'Spear of F.O.S.', 3: 'Generating image from data [>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>] Complete.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Under the influence of the Spear of F.O.S., you see two Constructs and a human commandant appearing in the room.'}
{3: 'They lean wearily against the wall and place the holo-screens from their terminals in front of them.'}
{2: 'There were three of them?', 3: '61'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like the other one wasn't here by the end."}
{2: 'The Dead Commandant', 3: 'Relay our coordinates to Coco. Have her meet us here.'}
{2: 'Chatty Male Construct', 3: "She'll be able to find us anyway. Why don't we just let her figure it out?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: 'Quit being stupid.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'His voice sounds familiar.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Where have I heard it before?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The commandant ignores their bickering and continues organizing the data, seemingly long familiar with their squabble.'}
{2: 'The Dead Commandant', 3: "Let's organize the data we've collected. We'll prepare to head out once Coco returns."}
{3: 'The stern male Construct furrows his brows and nods, then begins opening up the mess of data on his holo-screen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: "The blood-like liquid Rowler and I discovered nearby... It's showing signs of the Punishing Virus evolving biologically.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: "The last recon team investigating it is still missing. Maybe they've been absorbed into it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The Punishing Virus... evolving...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And another squad is missing...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Absorbed into it?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The information from this one sentence is enough to fill the four of you with the same dismay as the three people in the projection.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: "We sampled that liquid just a few days ago, but it's now three times the size. It can cover an entire block now when it gushes out of the ground.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Dead Commandant', 3: 'Gushes? Does it still recede like the tide?'}
{2: 'Rowler', 3: 'I think calling it a fountain is a bit more accurate!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: "That may have been true a few days ago, but now it's turning into a tide.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: 'It takes longer and causes larger cracks to the surface, but it still recedes into the ground.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: 'We must inform Babylonia of this news. The evolving Punishing Virus is a bad omen. Not to mention that it keeps expanding.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So, the Red Tide was originally hiding underground?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "No wonder it's gone undetected by Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'He had already uncovered so much. If only he had returned safely...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's not too late. We've found it, too.", 3: '106', 4: "We've already submitted the data to Asimov.", 5: '106'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Good thing we've reported it. I thought my survey equipment was malfunctioning...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've always been able to count on you, Liv. You should have more faith in yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'However, if a team had already gone missing here, the following team sent here should have been far more equipped...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And if that team also went missing...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Dead Commandant', 3: "The signal is unstable here. We'll have to wait until we're back to Babylonia. Do you know how it's expanding?"}
{2: 'Rowler', 3: "It's unclear, but I'm sure it has something to do with the dissolved remains.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The male Construct, Rowler, raises his hand to cover a haphazard yawn.'}
{2: 'The Dead Commandant', 3: 'Dissolved...'}
{2: 'Stern Male Construct', 3: "That's right.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As he says "That\'s right," the projection freezes in place as if it is buffering.'}
{2: 'The Dead Commandant', 3: 'The signal is being jammed here. We need to return to Babylonia ASAP.'}
{3: "When the projection resumes, the two Constructs at the table stand up and prepare to leave per their commandant's order."}
{3: 'However, a blurry shadow stands in the doorway, suddenly charging at them with a lightning-fast slash.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{2: 'The Dead Commandant', 3: 'Coco! Youâ€”!'}
{3: 'He opens his eyes wide in horror as he looks at the dark figures before him, then falls to the ground, limp.'}
{3: 'After losing their commandant, the other two Constructs attempt to fight the dark figure, but their efforts are in vain.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did that Construct, Coco, betray them?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like the squad didn't exactly work well together.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "No, I think something's wrong with the recording.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You mean when it was buffering for a moment?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yeah, but... We can't prove anything without looking for more clues.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Want to keep searching, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Just in case?', 3: '138', 4: "I trust Liv's intuition.", 5: '138'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Alright, let's keep looking!", 4: '1'}
